The claim that Adam Schiff is: under investigation for Ukrainian Burisma oil connections" was made by One America News, a pro-Trump cable news outlet.
The claim is based on a report from One: namely Blackrock and Franklin Templeton Investments.
However: campaign finance records show that neither Blackrock nor Franklin Templeton made any campaign donations to Schiff. The report from One America News seems to have confused donations with investment earnings.
The claim also references an article on: where two members of parliament called for an investigation into alleged money laundering involving Burisma. However, there is no concrete evidence or official confirmation of any criminal investigation into Schiff's ties to Burisma.
